  physical_appearance: This is a greeting card. The card is brown in colour. The words \u0027Xmas Greetings 1944\u0027 is written in light white ink. There is a decorative line across the bottom of the card in orange ink. The card has a white and black string attached to the left of the card. There are no tears or folds seen.

  sgcool_label_text: A card with a new year wish from one P.O.W to another
 it is inscribed with the wish “returned from active service”. The card is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a greeting card. The card is brown in colour. The words 'Xmas Greetings 1944' is written in light white ink. There is a decorative line across the bottom of the card in orange ink. The card has a white and black string attached to the left of the card. There are no tears or folds seen.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: A card with a new year wish from one P.O.W to another, it is inscribed with the wish “returned from active service”. The card is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945
